title: Who wrote Patsy Cline’s hit song 'Crazy'? - Quora

response.answer_text: Willie Nelson wrote “Crazy.”The story, at least the way I hear it, was that Willie had shown the song to Charlie Dick, Patsy’s husband. Charlie thought it would be a great song for Patsy suggested Willie show ther the song. Willie was reluctant to say the least, considering Patsy was known to have quite a temper. Charlie drove Willie to their home, and Willie protested. He said “what happens if she don’t like it? We’ll be lucky to get out alive.” Well it took a little persuasion, but Willie finally showed her the song, and the rest is history.
